utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Good, you guys are all here!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! What's up?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I have a job interview at Ralph Lauren tomorrow!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Congratulations! Ohh, that's great!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Boy, that guy's underwear sucks!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wh-what?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I got this pair marked excess, I gotta tell ya, there was no room for excess anything in there.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Anyway, I'm going to be the coordinator of the woman's collection, I'll work right under the director, it's the perfect, perfect job for me!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow! Well, if you nail the interview, you'll get it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You wanna work on your interview skills?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: O-okay!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay! All right, let's start with the handshake. Hi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Very good handshake, good wrist action.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Let me try.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Oh my God! What did I ever do to you?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Did I squeeze it too hard?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Let's just say, I'm glad I'm not Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's right Ross, I can see you in your new apartment! And you can see me! Same as yesterday, same as the day before.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is he doing his shark attack bit yet?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nope. Op, wait! There he goes.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Very funny Ross! Very life-like and funny. Okay. Oh no-no-no, I wasn't waving at you lady. Whoa, maybe I was! Hey, Monica, this totally hot girl in Ross's building is flirting with me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Get in there man! Flirt back, mix it up!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I-I-I'm down with that. Okay, here goes. How you a-doin'? It worked! She's waving me over. Okay, I-I-I'll be right over. Let's see, she's on the third floor…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! She is pretty, huh?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Tell me about it, huh? Oh no-no-no, I'm not with her, she's just Monica! Ewwuck!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Joey! Great stuff huh?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: This is your place?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Of course it is. Yeah, come on in. Ooh-ooh, go by the window you can pretend to be surfing.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But I counted, you're not supposed to live here! Oh man!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ugh!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What happened?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I ended up at Ross's place. Oh, I musta missed counted or something. Damn! She's not there anymore. Oh, l-l-look, Ross is doing his 'Watching TV' bit.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No Joey, I think he's just watchin' TV.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Okay, now I've really have to go!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But it's just so unfair that our date has to get cut short just 'cause some guy shot at a store clerk.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: I know, but it's my job, sweethart!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, then maybe I can come too!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, you go.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Bye-bye.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: 'Kay, bye!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh God!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh I just miss him so much!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! For just a week you guys are really close, huh?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, it's weird. I can't help it though he's so sweet, he's like this little puppy dog, y'know? But like a really tough one that shots bad guys. Ohh, I just love beginning parts of relationships, y'know?! You just like can't keep your hands off each other.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know it is the best.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So-so how long did that last for you and Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What? It's still going on.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Come on, seriously! When did it end?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I-I am serious, I mean, we're, we're all over each other all the time.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, you know where you are better than I do. I was just curious.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What don't you just calm down Phoebe! All right?! Why don’t you just get all your facts before you run around telling everybody that you're the only hot couple!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: God, I woke the beast. Sorry. I was wrong obviously, I just—I misspoke. It's okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh no, it is okay, I mean as long as you know that Chandler and I are also very hot and fiery, just as hot as you! I mean our flame, whew, is on fire!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Monica, here's your broom back.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You are so cute.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh hey, how'd the interview go?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh, horrible! I did the stupidest, most embarrassing thing!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Did you tell the guy you wanted to have sex with his wife and then fall right out of your chair?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So what happened?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh, it was horrible! And-and the interview part went so well, y'know? I even made him laugh. He said something about a boat and I was like, "Well, yeah! If you've got enough life jackets!" Trust me, it was actually, it was very funny. Anyway, so we were saying good-bye and ugh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What happened?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, we were shaking hands and he kinda leaned toward me… Y'know maybe he was going to open the door, but I totally miss read him and I uhhh…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You kissed him?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I didn't know what else to do!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well you coulda tried, not kissing him.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thanks Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Rach, a guy from Ralph Lauren called, you got a second interview!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can't believe it! I got a second interview!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I bet that kiss isn't looking like such a big mistake now, is it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What-what, wait a minute, you don't think that's why he wants me back?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! No?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: A kiss? What are you talking about?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I accidentally kissed him in the interview, and now he wants me back y'know of course, 'cause "Let's bring the girl back who kisses everybody!"

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Come on, Rach.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! What if he thinks I'm the kind of girl that-that would just sleep with him?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He probably wants you back because you're right for the job.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Maybe. I-I don't know—Oh God, how could I be so stupid?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh Rachel look, don't say that, I think you just need a hug from Joey. Come on. Come on. She's back! Hot girl's back!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, well I'm not totally back yet, but thank you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, in Ross's building! She's back! She's back! Okay, wait there, I'll be over in a second. Got it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I gotta check out this hot girl! There she is!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Damnit!! Did you move?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes. I lived with you guys for a while and then I found this place. I'm Ross.

utterance.speaker: The Old Man
utterance.content: Yes?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh do you happen to have a hot girl in there?

utterance.speaker: The Old Man
utterance.content: No. I'm all alone.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. Sorry about that. Oh, hey little girl. Uhh, is-is your mommy, or sister, or babysitter by any chance a hot girl?

utterance.speaker: The Little Girl
utterance.content: Daddy!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Later! Oh man! Hot girl! Hot girl!!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Zelner
utterance.content: Hi Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Zelner
utterance.content: Come on in.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Zelner
utterance.content: It's really nice to see you again.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Zelner
utterance.content: Oh Rachel, uhh…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Zelner
utterance.content: Just ah…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Zelner
utterance.content: Here let me…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wh-whoa! All right, okay-okay, I see, I see what's going on here! Now listen, look-look, I'm sorry if I gave you the wrong impression, but I am not some hussy who will just sleep around to get ahead! Now even though I , hey-hey-hey, even though I kissed you, that does not give you the right to demand sex from me. I do not want, this job that bad. Good day, sir.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh, you will not believe what that sleaze-ball from Ralph Lauren did too me!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay-okay that-that's amazing. How did you know that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You got ink on your lip.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh. Ohhhhhhhhh….

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So what do you say, maybe sometime I hold your gun?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: I don't know man, we're really not supposed to do that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, what can happen? I mean, would you…

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm gonna say no.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, do you want to go see a movie after dinner tonight?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh we can't, we already have plans.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, same thing we did all day, hang out at Gary's apartment. He is so amazing, we never left the bedroom. But have fun at the movie.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, we're not seeing a movie!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You're not? Then why did you ask us if we wanted to go?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh umm, that's because I just wanted to y'know walk in on me and Chandler while we were, y'know, doing it all night. Will you excuse me for just a second?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. Chandler? Can I see you for a second?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. We have got to beat them! {Here we go yet again.}

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: 'Cause, Gary and Phoebe think they're a hotter couple than we are!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ohh, so?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So! So we've got to go upstairs and have a lot of sex to prove them wrong!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica, you have got to stop this competitive thing! Okay? It's crazy. {Finally! The voice of reason.} I mean, just impress Gary and Phoebe we have to go upstairs and have sex over and over and I'm saying no to this, why? Get your coat.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: The Man
utterance.content: Excuse me. You should check this out, tell the other tenants. Apparently he's running around looking for some kind of a hot girl.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Who isn't?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't, I don't think we've meet. I-I'm Ross.

utterance.speaker: The Hot Girl
utterance.content: I know. You're the guy who wouldn't chip in for the handyman.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nevermind!

utterance.speaker: The Hot Girl
utterance.content: No, I-I actually thought it was unfair the way everyone reacted. I mean you had just moved in.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I had just moved in. Thank you! Listen umm…

utterance.speaker: The Hot Girl
utterance.content: Jen.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Jen, I know this may sound a little… But uh, would you maybe wanna grab a cup of coffee sometime, or…

utterance.speaker: Jen
utterance.content: Sure! That would be nice.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm?

utterance.speaker: Jen
utterance.content: Oh! My number is on there. Give me a call.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I will give you a call.

utterance.speaker: Jen
utterance.content: I'll see you later.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Jen
utterance.content: I forgot my paper.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That was amazing!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe and Gary are so gonna hear about this at dinner.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That was amazing.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We are the hottest! Huh? No one is hotter than we are! You're the best.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, you're the best.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, you're the best.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, you're the best.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I am the best.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey guys! What 'cha been doin'?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Joey! Isn't that the girl that waved at you the other day?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know. But I can see through your sheet. Yeah, yeah, that's her. But y'know what? Doesn't matter, I'm never gonna get to meet her anyway.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Because it's impossible to find her apartment! She lives in some like of hot girl parallel universe, or something.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you talking about? She obviously lives on the second floor, seventh apartment from the left!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No. No. No. She lives on the third floor, eighth apartment from the left.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, those first two windows, that's the lobby. And y'know the other one over there, that's the stairway. You've been counting wrong.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I did not know that! Thank you Monica. I can't believe I almost lost another girl because of counting.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So uhh, you ready?

utterance.speaker: Jen
utterance.content: Sure, I'll just get my coat. Could you get that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sure. Joey…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dahhhhh!! No! Noooo!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ah, first, I-I would like to say thank you for agreeing to see me again.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Zelner
utterance.content: That's quite all right, but I feel obligated to tell you that this meeting is being videotaped.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Umm, well, first I would like to start by apologizing for kissing you and uh, for yelling at you.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Zelner
utterance.content: Fair enough.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Now you're probably going to hire one of the people who did not ah, who did, who did not umm, yell at you and storm out, and I think that's a big mistake and here's why. I made a huge fool of myself and I came back, that shows courage. When I thought you wanted sex in exchange for this job, I said no. That shows integrity. And, I was not afraid to stand up for myself and that shows courage. Okay umm, now I know I already said courage, but y'know you gotta have courage. And umm, and finally when I thought you were making sexual advances in the workplace, I said no and I was not litigious. {By the way, litigious means to want to litigate and litigate is to make a lawsuit against. So she didn't want to sue him. Don't worry, I had to look it up too.} So there you go, you got, you got courage, you got integrity, you got courage again, and not litigious. Look Mr…

utterance.speaker: Mr. Zelner
utterance.content: Zelner.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Zelner! Right! I knew that! I really, really want this job and I think, I think I would be really good at it.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Zelner
utterance.content: Y'know what? I may regret this but uh, I'm going to give you a shot.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! You are?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Zelner
utterance.content: Um-hmm.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really? Oh thank you! Oh… Oh, would it be completely inappropriate to give you a hug?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Zelner
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, well then how about a handshake? Oh God I'm sorry! Oh God, I'm sorry! I did not mean to touch that—I mean you there. There. Uhh, okay, so thank-thank you, I'm going to leave now thank you very much uh-huh, thank you so—Hey! I'll see you Monday!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You tired Chandler?

utterance.content: You better believe he's tired, after the day we had! If you know what I mean. You know what I mean?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Honey, the tortilla chips know what you mean.

utterance.content: So uh Chandler, you like that badge I got you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah, it's so cool. Now I gotta go, Officer Bing has gotta, 10-100. That's pee-pee.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, you have a, a twig in your hair.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, umm, we kinda took a little detour on the way over here.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Yeah, we took a little stroll in the park and no one was around, so…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You didn't!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We did! We violated Section 12 Paragraph 7 of the criminal code!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The park huh? A public place.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I hear ya. Excuse me for just a second!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica! This is the Men's room! Isn't it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes it is. You see I've always found the men's bathroom very sexual. Haven't you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No. And if I did, I don't think we'd be going out. Monica, this is getting ridiculous!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come on, we can't let them win!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ugh, we have already proved that we are hot! Okay? So why-why are you getting so obsessed about this thing?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Because Phoebe and Gary are in that-can't-keep-their-hands-off-each-other-doing-it-in-the-park phase!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I feel really sad that we're not…really there anymore.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh wow! Is that what this all have been about?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wasn't it a lot more exciting when we were y'know all over each other all the time?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah that was great. That was really great! But to tell you the truth, I'm more excited about where we are right now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah! I've never been in a relationship that's lasted this long before. Y'know to get past the beginning and still be around each other all the time, I think that's pretty incredible. And the fact that this is happening all with you, yeah I think that's pretty exciting.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That is so sweet. I know that I was acting a little crazy but umm, I feel the same way.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know what I just realized? You just freaked out about our relationship.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Did not.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes you did! Admit it! You freaked out!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, I freaked out a little.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Little?! You freaked out big time! Okay? And I fixed it! We have switched places! I am the relationship and king and you are the crazy, irrational screw up! And now we're back.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I cannot believe Ross is buying this!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank God! I can't watch him anymore!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You guys ready fore the movies?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! Oh by the way, thank you for loaning us Pamela and Yasmine.

utterance.content: Man! They cannot get enough!
